comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Maneuvers of the National Guard of New York held at Camp Whitman, Fishkill Plains, New York, July 17th -August 1st , 1915 .

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for connecting this and related photos up with the probable event. Although I haven't yet found this specific photo reproduced, I did find testimony that pictures of the proceedings were considered newsworthy in a New-York Tribune advertisement (July 23, 1915), seen via the historic American newspapers site, Chronicling America: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1915-07-23/ed-... (lower right). We'll add information when we next update the description.
